changeSet.sql:
INSERT INTO TBL_UNIT (ID,C_CREATED_BY,D_CREATED_DATE,C_LAST_MODIFIED_BY,D_LAST_MODIFIED_DATE,N_VERSION,N_E_STATUS,B_EDITABLE,C_NAME_EN,C_NAME_FA,N_CATEGORY_UNIT,N_SYMBOL_UNIT) values (-11,'j.azad',to_timestamp('03-JUL-20 10.15.40.056000000 AM','DD-MON-RR HH.MI.SSXFF AM'),'j.azad',to_timestamp('11-JUL-20 08.34.52.826000000 AM','DD-MON-RR HH.MI.SSXFF AM'),2,1,0,'kilogramme','کیلوگرم',1,1);
insert INTO TBL_UNIT (ID, C_CREATED_BY, D_CREATED_DATE, C_LAST_MODIFIED_BY, D_LAST_MODIFIED_DATE, N_VERSION, N_E_STATUS, B_EDITABLE, C_NAME_EN, C_NAME_FA, N_CATEGORY_UNIT, N_SYMBOL_UNIT) VALUES (-32, 'liquibase', current_timestamp, null, null, 0, 1, 0, 'دلار', 'Dollar', 0, 22);
